attributes.action: give police better tools to stop crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police in Britain are the only police force round the world to not be armed with anything more than a baton which can only be used in face to face situations. Our police are the only ones who don’t have to wear a stab vest. But in the modern world the criminals have guns, knives. They have and army worth of arsenal tools and our police have a baton, we have armed police but one or two teams to one county aren’t anuff. It doesn’t have to be guns but at least something better then a stick
